es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.bgame.control

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.ucm.fdi.tp.basecode.bgame.control.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConsoleCtrl, GameClient, GameServer

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller's top class. It allows starting a game with a list of pieces (that is provided in the construction) and makes operations such as making a move or stopping the game, etc.

    Clase base del controlador. Permite que comience un juego con una lista de fichas dadas en el constructor, y realiza operaciones como ejecutar un movimiento de un jugador, parar el juego, etc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Game game
      The game on which the controller operates.
      protected java.util.List<Piece> pieces
      The list of pieces to be used in game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller(Game game, java.util.List<Piece> pieces)
      Constructs a controller.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void makeMove(Player player)
      Makes a move in the game being played.
      void restart()
      Restart the game (the one referenced by game).
      void start()
      Starts the controller.
      void stop()
      Stops the game that is being played in this controller (the one referenced by game).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • game

        protected Game game
        The game on which the controller operates.

        Juego sobre el que opera el controlador.

      • pieces

        protected java.util.List<Piece> pieces
        The list of pieces to be used in game.

        Lista de fichas que se utilizarán en game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller(Game game,
                  java.util.List<Piece> pieces)
        Constructs a controller. Should be called by subclasses to set the values of game and pieces.

        Construye un controlador. Este constructor debe ser llamado desde las subclases para dar valor a los atributos game y pieces.

        Parameters:
        game - An instance of class Game on which the controller operates (it can be null as well).

        Instancia de la clase Game sobre la que va a operar el controlador (o null).

        pieces - A list of pieces to be used when starting game (it can be null as well).

        Lista de fichas que se utilizara cuando comience el juego game (o null).

    • Method Detail

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the game that is being played in this controller (the one referenced by game).

        Finaliza el juego que se está ejecutando actualmente en este controlador, que está referenciado por game).

      • restart

        public void restart()
        Restart the game (the one referenced by game).

        Reinicia el juego referenciado por game).

      • makeMove

        public void makeMove(Player player)
        Makes a move in the game being played.

        Hace un movimiento en el juego que se esta jugando.

        Parameters:
        player - A player.

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the controller. In principle it starts the game assigned to game if it is not null.

        Inicia el controlador. En principio, inicia el juego asignado al atributo game, si es distinto de null.
